title: Solana Mobile Plans 'Cheaper' Follow-Up to Saga Smartphone: Report
description: A cheaper successor to the Solana Saga is reportedly planned, after the original phone sold out as buyers harvested bundled tokens and airdrops.

title: Why is Bitcoin price stuck?
description:
Bitcoin's price is stuck in a range, balancing optimism from increased institutional investments against concerns over potential sell-offs by miners.

Bitcoin (BTC) price is stuck inside a range, reflecting uncertainty and indecision among market participants after spot Bitcoin ETF were approved last week.

As of Jan. 16, BTC's price has been confined between $41,550 and $43,000. This stagnation persists despite a previous attempt at a breakout earlier in the month, during which the cryptocurrency briefly surged to a high of over $49,000, only to fall back into its current range.

The flatness in Bitcoin's price can be attributed to several factors discussed below.

Read more

title: Bitcoin’s surging correlation with Nasdaq signals convergence with traditional finance
description:
Quick Take Following the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs, Bitcoin appears to be realigning itself with the traditional finance ecosystem. Historical data shows that in 2022, despite a downward price trend, Bitcoin’s behavior was closely tied to equities such as Nasdaq and SPX, while it exhibited an inverse correlation with the rising Dollar Index (DXY), […]

The post Bitcoin’s surging correlation with Nasdaq signals convergence with traditional finance appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitfinex prevents $15 billion exploit, reveals XRP Ledger vulnerability
description: Bitfinex's systems automatically flagged the transaction because it requires a "delivered amount" field, blocking the attempted exploit.

title: Crypto fear and greed index hits ‘neutral’ as Bitcoin ETFs fail to raise prices
description: Bitcoin ETFs were hailed as a milestone for crypto adoption on Wall Street, but their impact remains unclear.

title: Blackrock CEO supports Ethereum (ETH), this rival token Priced at only $0.07 can be the perfect Buy Right Now.

title: Aave eyes expansion to Solana blockchain with Neon EVM proposal
description: The governance body of the Aave lending protocol is considering a significant proposal that could broaden its reach to the Solana blockchain. This initiative, presented by the Neon Foundation in collaboration with the Aave Chan Initiative, aims to implement version 3 of the Aave protocol on Neon EVM – a platform that bridges Ethereum dApps […]

title: 3 Coins With Possible 2000% ROI Potential In 2024
description: The crypto market recently witnessed a significant influx of $1.18 billion into digital asset investment products, primarily driven by the launch of a spot Bitcoin ETF. This event marked a notable moment in the market, although it didn’t surpass the record $1.5 billion inflow set during the launch of Bitcoin futures ETF in October 2021. […]

title: BSI Releases World’s First International AI Safety Guideline
description: In a groundbreaking move, the British Standards Institution (BSI) has unveiled the world’s inaugural international guideline on artificial intelligence (AI) safety. The comprehensive guide aims to empower organizations to establish and enhance AI management systems with robust safeguards, ensuring responsible development and utilization of AI tools. This release comes at a crucial juncture in the […]

title: X payments secures Utah license in digital banking push
description: X Payments LLC, a subsidiary of Elon Musk’s tech empire, has achieved a significant milestone in its quest to revolutionize digital banking. The company recently obtained the Money Transmitter License from the state of Utah, marking a pivotal step in its expansion across the United States. This development, effective from January 12, aligns X Payments […]

title: Mantle’s mETH Poised To Reach $850M TVL With Upcoming Limit Increase
description:
Mantle Staked Ether (mETH) is rapidly becoming a standout player in the world of decentralized finance (DeFi). As highlighted by Tom Wan, a prominent blockchain figure, with a remarkable 24% growth in just the past week, mETH has surged to become the 5th largest liquid staking token (LST), boasting an impressive total value locked (TVL) […]
